channel.title: Quick thought
channel.description:
if you think about it, jagex helped us for multple reasons
1.)all the bots out sucked (including aryan) we need a new idea 2.)THE CLIENT IS SMALLER, we can run MANY MANY more bots at a time now
someon just needs to make a bot now :)

item.title: Quick thought
item.dc:creator: @robster2000 robster2000
item.description:
@robster2000 wrote:

ok thank you

item.title: Quick thought
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

Pwnd:

Also, robster, make your own bot. Try to fucking learn something, then you can try a bot out.

Er…could be a bit less…um…“fucking learn something”?

rob, take a look at some java tutorials elsewhere - unfortunately the RS cheating community seems to be moving away from packaging its knowledge in short, useful bits intended to be shared with people trying to learn.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @robster2000 robster2000
item.description:

Do you know anywhere where I can find out where to learn? otherwise I would

rob

item.title: Quick thought
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“masonw, post:17, topic:2981”][quote author=Krichevskoy link=topic=3365.msg32731#msg32731 date=1147908990]

how do you avoid the masses of leechers though?

Don’t release your bot open-source
Or make it so that you have to compile it on the computer you’re going to use it with, or some other semi-difficult thing to keep total leechers (who won’t even ask good questions) out.
[/quote]

If they are leachers why would they care if it’s open scource, they don’t know anything about java.[/quote]

Take a look at impsoft…

Read full topic

item.title: Quick thought
item.dc:creator: @yeha_x_d yeha x d
item.description:
@yeha_x_d wrote:

[quote=“robster2000, post:12, topic:2981”]If anyone made a bot would I get to have it?
im not a leecher (making a scar script right now and havent downloaded much) and have posted a few things
It is just i would like to try one out aswell

ty rob[/quote]

this is the F___ing problem…

anything that is kept ‘private’ without strict auth style ownership will be leaked…personally I like the ‘make it hard to understand how to use’ idea

that way through natural selection the smart people can use the ‘thing’ without letting nubs, leeches, noobs and misc others from ruining it or more importantly overusing it

Read full topic

item.title: Quick thought
item.dc:creator: @robster2000 robster2000
item.description:
@robster2000 wrote:

oh dam looks like I am never going to get to try out a bot then

rob

Read full topic

item.title: Quick thought
item.dc:creator: @roll3blunts roll3blunts
item.description:
@roll3blunts wrote:

sdouble:

Most likely not. Because of Regex’s and fellow devs’ generosity, the cheating became what it was. Jagex was annoyed, legit players were annoyed, player mods were annoyed, other cheaters were annoyed, etc, so if/when a bot is created, I’m betting it will be a private bot (developers/select few), or a pay bot like sbot3 was. You won’t see the same type of thing again.

i know its bullshit but he’s right.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick thought
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

if you think about it,
1.) Aryan WAS an AWESOME bot before leechers destroyed it by overusing.
2.) Client is pretty much the same size, just heaps of classes.

But yeah I am happy Aryan is finally gone - it was like bait for leechers, time to work on a new bot NLB - No Leechers Bot
